__e: A few days' care, and she'll be out of it.
You owe me for the care and the time you spent at my place.
The only problem is, I am a one-patient man, and I'm already committed to you.
I thought of paying people to take them in, anyone... But if they started asking questions, it would mean disaster.
I'm so glad that you've come to help with her care.
Oh I think it's so lovely what you do for old dogs. Taking them into care foster in their final days.
